issue.title: Update Layout.md based on discussion on the mailing list
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-104](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-104). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. Buffers are 64 byte aligned and padded. (we should give some details and/or an example algorithm for why this is important).
2.  Types array for unions should only have 1 byte instead of two (mention union of unions as an alternative).
